name: Query Azure Cosmos DB from a serverless SQL pool

content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'cosmosdb'))
    
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [cosmosdb]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = '<removed>'
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmos-weslbo;Database=AdventureWorks',
                OBJECT = 'sales',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmosdb'
) AS [sales]

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmos-weslbo;Database=AdventureWorks',
                OBJECT = 'sales',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmosdb'
)
WITH (
    OrderID VARCHAR(10) '$.id',
    OrderDate VARCHAR(10) '$.orderdate',
    CustomerID INTEGER '$.customerid',
    CustomerName VARCHAR(40) '$.customerdetails.customername',
    CustomerEmail VARCHAR(30) '$.customerdetails.customeremail',
    Product VARCHAR(30) '$.product',
    Quantity INTEGER '$.quantity',
    Price FLOAT '$.price'
)
AS sales
ORDER BY OrderID;
